name: HeroLogoBillboardSplit
description: Hero section with split layout (description left, buttons right), large text logo that scales to fill container width, and single framed media at bottom. Supports flex-col or flex-col-reverse layout order.

description.example: Create stunning, responsive websites with our comprehensive component library

layoutOrder.note: 'default' displays split section (description/buttons) then logo (flex-col). 'reverse' displays logo then split section (flex-col-reverse).

buttons.note: Only first 2 buttons are displayed using slice(0, 2). Uses theme.defaultButtonVariant for styling.

imageSrc.note: Supports external URLs with unoptimized prop

videoSrc.note: Takes precedence over imageSrc if both provided

imageAlt.note: Empty string marks image as decorative (aria-hidden)

frameStyle.note: 'card' displays media in simple card with padding. 'browser' wraps media in browser mockup with address bar and window controls.

propsSchema.buttons: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>

usageExample:
<ThemeProvider defaultButtonVariant="text-stagger" defaultTextAnimation="entrance-slide" borderRadius="pill" cardStyle="layered-gradient">
  <HeroLogoBillboardSplit 
    logoText="ACME" 
    description="Create stunning, responsive websites with our comprehensive component library" 
    buttons={[
      { text: 'Get Started', href: '#' },
      { text: 'Learn More', href: '#' }
    ]}
    layoutOrder="default"
    imageSrc="/hero.jpg"
    imageAlt="Hero showcase"
    frameStyle="browser"
  />
</ThemeProvider>
